txt.en:
'In the matter of weaponsmithy, you have few peers, and I would ask an important favour of you.

'Among those of our kindred who have joined the Wardens of Annúminas, there are those who must be recognized for feats of valour above and beyond the call of duty. Upon these heroes, we bestow ceremonial blades fashioned in a likeness similar to the sword of kings, which was wielded by Elendil and broken at Barad-dûr.

'If you have the skill to forge these blades, it would gain you great favour among my people.'

'You have brought me the ceremonial blades as I have asked, and they are among the finest crafted I have yet seen! My thanks to you, [placeholder]. You have earned much honour in the lands of Evendim.'
'I understand resources are scarce, but if you could see your way to crafting a few ceremonial blades for us, we could surely use them.'
The Rangers of the North confer ceremonial blades upon the greatest of their heroes.
Present your Ceremonial Blades to Cannasgam at Tinnudir
Cannasgam is at Tinnudir in Evendim.\n\nCannasgam has asked you to forge the ceremonial blades, which the Rangers of the North confer upon their greatest heroes.
